shortDescription: Watch the fiercely competitive sport of camel racing from the best seats in the house, zooming right alongside the majestic creatures.

Camel racing is a sport that has been an inherent part of Qatari culture for decades now and there is no better way to experience it than watching it from a 4x4 that zooms alongside the race track. At the Al Shahaniya Racetrack, join 365 Adventures to witness three intense races.

description:
Call us now for an exhilarating desert adventure perfect for a relaxing weekend. Get yourself a unique 5 star night stay in the desert. Enjoy an afternoon full of adrenaline packed dune bashing and a relaxed night under the stars at the Regency camp fit for royalty. This package includes a traditional buffet dinner and a princely breakfast the next morning before we drop you to your preferred location within Doha city.

  • Pick & drop-off to your location of convenience within Doha city, each Land Cruiser seats 6 people.

  • 20-minutes stopover to experience camel riding in the desert (as per your preference), falcons, mules, and other local fauna.

  • Welcome experience includes complimentary Gahwa & Karak.

  • Get a quick peek into the lives and style of local Qataris at the traditional Bedouin camp.

  • Up to 45 minutes adrenaline-packed dune bashing experience in 4X4 Land cruiser’s with trained drivers.

  • Stopover at the top of the singing dunes for a panoramic view of the desert. It’s also called Photography Dune.

  • A night’s stay at the royal 5 star camp in the middle of sand dunes

  • Get a quick peek of the unique Khor Al Adaid (Inland sea) and catch a gorgeous sunset.

  • Saudi Arabia & UAE Border on the opposite side

  • Layover at the camp

  • Bonfire and a 5-star buffet dinner as well as breakfast.

  • Private beach with kid’s play area

name: # Heritage Exploration - Nomadic Adventures
shortDescription: In this overnight trip, explore the desert and experience a taste of the nomadic lifestyle of the Qatari locals.
description:
Get a taste of the nomadic lifestyle.


This two days/one night trip is the most perfect and comprehensive way to experience Qatar. You will first visit Mesaieed, stopping for a moment to ride camels, before heading out to the singing sand dunes for a thrilling session of dune-bashing. After dune-bashing, you can relax and swim in the Khor Al Adaid, Qatar’s famous Inland Sea. Following that, you will be treated to an overnight rustic camping experience in the desert. The next day, you will have the chance to visit one of the most acclaimed UNESCO heritage sites of the country, the Al Zubara Fort and if time permits, you will also explore Al Jumail, an abandoned 19th century village. This trip includes meals, one of which will be hosted in a local farm by a Qatari host.

name: # Katara Walking Tour
shortDescription: At the Katara Cultural Village, the largest and the most multidimensional cultural project of Qatar, experience the many cultures of the world.
description:
Explore Qatar’s biggest cultural exchange project.

Spend a few hours at the Katara Cultural Village — Qatar’s biggest multicultural hub. Marvel at the beauty of the Blue Mosque, adorned with turquoise and purple mosaic and the Golden Mosque, the Ottoman-style structure garnished with gold chips. See the Pigeon Towers, a prominent example of the Islamic architectural style and relax at the Amphitheater, the gem of the cultural village, which perfectly balances the classical Greek theatre concept with the subtle everlasting beauty of traditional Arabic architecture. You will also have a chance to relax at the Al Jazeera Media Cafe and the Katara Beach. The Cultural Village is also dotted with numerous sculptures (such Gandhi’s Three Wise Monkeys, Force of Nature, and more).


DESTINATION: Qatar


DEPARTURE/PICKUP LOCATION: Blue Mosque (at Katara, close to the pigeon towers)


DEPARTURE TIME: 9 AM / 2 PM


DURATION: 2 hours 


DRESS CODE: Smart Casual (Culturally Appropriate)


Included/Inclusions:

  • Professional tour guide

Not Included/Exclusions:

Tour Plan/Itinerary

  • Visit Golden Mosque

name: # Meet & Greet with Abu Ahmed
shortDescription: Explore the outskirts of Qatar and gain an insight into Qatar’s traditional farming legacy with a tour of a local farm.
description:
Learn about Qatar’s farming legacy from a Qatari farmer.


In this five hour guided eco-tour, we will venture out of the city and into the outskirts to the north of Doha. You will visit a solar powered local farm and be treated to a fantastic meal by your Qatari host, Abu Ahmed. You will also have the chance to pick vegetables before setting out for Qatar’s ghost town: the Al Jumail ruins, the only remnants of a bustling and important fishing village from the 19th century. For admirers of local culture and history, this trip will be a dream come true. 


DESTINATION: Qatar


DEPARTURE TIME: 8 AM / 2 PM

name: # Msheireb Museum Walking Tour
shortDescription: Gain unique insights into Qatar’s traditional history and learn about four heritage houses with Msheireb Museums.
description:
Explore Qatar’s traditional history at the Msheireb Museums.

Located within the oldest part of the nation’s capital, Msheireb Museums is a collection of four historic heritage houses that together form an important part of Qatar’s national history. Join 365 Adventures for a guided tour that reveals unique aspects of Qatar’s cultural and social development. Engage in conversations about the country’s past and it’s future as you explore the four heritage houses — ‬Bin Jelmood House‭, ‬Company House‭, ‬Mohammed Bin Jassim House and Radwani House — each of which have been converted into world-class museums.


DESTINATION: Qatar


DEPARTURE/PICKUP LOCATION: Bin Jelmood House at Msheireb Museums

name: # Quickie to the Desert
shortDescription: Spend four hours exploring the desert and enjoying a memorable dune bashing experience with 365 Adventures.
description:
Experience the singing sands dunes of Qatar.

Memorable desert safari experience!


There is nothing quite as exhilarating as an adventure in the desert, so join 365 Adventures’ professional team of desert drivers for a relaxing tour of the singing sand dunes of Mesaieed. Then follow that up by a thrilling dune bashing experience to treasure forever. 


In addition to visiting the place where three countries — UAE, Saudi Arabia and Qatar — meet, this 4-hour getaway will afford you the chance to get a close look at Khor Al Adaid, Qatar’s breathtaking inland sea. 


Khor Al Adaid is one of the few places in the world where the sea encroaches deep into the desert and is a UNESCO recognized natural reserve with its own robust ecosystem.

name: # Souq Waqif Walking Tour
shortDescription: Spend a couple of hours soaking in the atmosphere and ambiance of Souq Waqif, one of Qatar’s best traditional marketplaces.
description:
Immerse yourself in Doha’s cultural heart.

Souq Waqif’s vibrant complex is without doubt one of the most atmospheric places to explore in Qatar and a perfect encapsulation of Qatari culture. Join us for a journey into this cultural hub and explore an ancient marketplace, masterfully redeveloped to maintain it’s original 19th-century look with mud walls and exposed wood. The souq also has some beautifully restored, authentic Qatari buildings that is sure to please fans of traditional architecture. The tour also includes a visit to both the nearby Spice Souq and the Falcon Souq. This is the perfect trip for first timers to Qatar and the best way to experience genuine Qatari culture in a short time.


DESTINATION: Qatar


DEPARTURE/PICKUP LOCATION: Souq Waqif/Falcon Souq

name: # Spearfishing
shortDescription: Join 365 Adventures for a unique experience that puts a modern twist on an ancient method of fishing.
description:
Go back to basics with an ancient fishing experience.


Spearfishing is an ancient method of fishing that has been used by historical fishermen in Qatar and across the world. With 365 Adventures exciting Spearfishing outing, experience a modern twist on the old ways.


DESTINATION: Qatar


DEPARTURE/PICKUP LOCATION: Wakrah Port


DEPARTURE TIME: 5 AM / 2 PM


DURATION: 5-6 hours


DRESS CODE: Comfortable


Included/Inclusions:

  • Water and juices in an ice-box and light sandwiches

  • Boat is shaded

  • Sea-sickness tablets are available with us- and you can choose to take them prior to going in the boat

  • Life jackets are currently not available, but if you want, I can arrange them for you for additional 100 QAR (3 life jackets, let me know the size)

  • All equipment for snorkeling and spearfishing (snorkels, spears, and other gear)


Tour Plan/Itinerary

  • Meet with our expert instructor captain

  • Get in the boat

  • Pass through the Coast Guards

  • 40 minutes boat ride until we arrive at a shallow place

  • Load up the equipment and suits + basic training on snorkeling + spearfishing

  • Take a dip, hit and come up - you can stay in the water until you feel tired

  • You can find Hamour and many types of fish

  • We carry the activity for 4 hours and keep trying different places if we don't find fish

  • We catch the fish and put it in a box - we have the box available with us

  • You can take the fish back home with you

name: # Zekreet & Richard Serra Sculptures
shortDescription: Drive along the Zekreet beach and through an untamed stretch of the desert to see Richard Serra’s famous sculptures.
description:
A desert outing brimming with beauty, both natural and man-made.


Join 365 Adventures for an outing to the desert that is brimming with beauty. Pass by the Mushroom Rock and stop by the Ras Abrouq Rock Formations, a landscape of limestone rock foundations sculpted by the wind. Drive past a local village and discover the Al Maha Sanctuary which is home to the elegant Arabian Oryx, the small antelope which is considered to be the country’s emblem. Finally, marvel at the magnificence of EAST-WEST / WEST-EAST by Richard Serra, a perfectly aligned art installation that stands tall in the desolate desert.

(Note: you may or may not spot Oryx)


DESTINATION: Qatar


DEPARTURE TIME: 9 AM / 2 PM

name: # Zubara Fort Visit
shortDescription: Learn more about Al Zubara, its history, and environment in a guided tour around the historical fort that now serves as a museum.
description:
Explore a historic military fort.


Originally built by Sheikh Abdullah bin Jassim Al Thani in 1938 to serve as a Coast Guard station, the Zubara Fort now serves as a museum displaying a varied collection of exhibits and artworks, with a focus on contemporary topical archaeological findings. The fort, which is included in the UNESCO World Heritage List in recognition for its preservation and as a unique example of a formative period, is the perfect place for fans of Middle Eastern history to learn more about military life in Qatar in the 18th and 19th centuries.


DESTINATION: Qatar

shortDescription: Safari thrills in the undiscovered mountain paths of Jabal Shada Asfal
description:
Hop in! A thrilling bumpy ride up the mountains of Jabal Shada Asfal awaits you. Come along with us to discover secret valleys in Al Baha. 

Picture this: rocky grey boulders with green forest paths that reveal stunning views at every turn. Look closely, you might catch a glimpse of the cattle and birds of this region.

Capture memories at well-planned viewpoints and photo stops. 

We’re also going to pass through ancient cave houses standing strong for centuries. Listen closely, they might reveal tales of history on their walls. As the sun sets, we find the perfect spot to sit and enjoy the orange skies with a cup of Qahwa and conversations with friends.

  2. Arrival Services: For arriving passengers, Al Maha provides assistance with immigration and customs procedures, baggage handling, and escorting you to your transportation or connecting flight.

name: Beginner Rock Climbing
shortDescription:
Man V/s Man’ah: Rocking Saudi Summer
An expertly guided rock climbing adventure in the greenery of Mount Man’ah
description:
This Summer in Saudia, challenge your crew on the ultimate adventure. Join us here in the secret destination of Mount Man’ah for the thrill of guided rock climbing.

Let your heart race against the wind as you conquer the rocky twists and turns. As you go higher you will find relaxation in the breathtaking views that open up. On our way down we come across a beautiful hidden green valley. Don’t worry we pause for snacks and snaps at stunning viewpoints. Catch your breath and enjoy the adrenaline rush!

But it's not just about the views – the rocks you'll encounter along the way are like nature's own gems sparkling in the sunlight.

Our experienced guides are here to ensure your safety and enjoyment.  As we pass through this beautiful hiking trail in Saudi Arabia, the experts will share stories of the land with us. 

Whether you're seeking adrenaline-pumping excitement or a peaceful connection with nature, this experience promises memories that will last a lifetime.

Tour Plan / Itinerary

●        Meet at 365 Adventures Center at Nourban Resort

●        Briefing session

●        Hike through the forest

●        Start climbing

●        Finish climb

name: Childhood of Bu Kinaz
shortDescription: Hike up the memory lane with Bu Kinaz through scenic pathways of his mountainous village in Jabal Shada
description:
Bu Kinaz grew up crossing waterfalls and climbing trees in Jabal Shada. 

We’re joining him at his coffee farm and reliving his childhood memories. The trail passes through forests that open up to reveal his young days amidst beautiful scenery and stories at every turn. This is a destination where memories are made and adventures await. 

Witness this mystery village come alive as our storyteller remembers rocks where he rested after playing with friends or his neighbour’s trees from where he picked fruits. Bu Kinaz will also take us to his school, which is now abandoned.  The historical structure stands tall as a reminder of the village’s rich cultural past. As we pass by the ancient stone houses and caves, we reflect on our own childhoods together and laugh a little. 

After our hike, we stop by a viewpoint where we exchange Qahwah, play forgotten games, snack on treats from back in the day.


Tour Plan / Itinerary 

  • Meet at Farsha Park

  • Head to Jabal Shada

name: Desert Glamping Safari - 20 Hours (5 Star)
shortDescription: Call us now for your regal glamping experience with a taste of the royal Qatari lifestyle in the desert. The package includes a trip to the breath-taking Khor Al Adaid, dune bashing, complete desert safari and succulent Dinner.
description:
Call us now for an exhilarating desert adventure perfect for a relaxing weekend. Get yourself a unique 5 star night stay in the desert. Enjoy an afternoon full of adrenaline packed dune bashing and a relaxed night under the stars at the Regency camp fit for royalty. This package includes a traditional buffet dinner and a princely breakfast the next morning before we drop you to your preferred location within Doha city.

 

Highlights:

  • Pick & drop-off to your location of convenience within Doha city, each Land Cruiser seats 6 people.

  • 20-minutes stopover to experience camel riding in the desert (as per your preference), falcons, mules, and other local fauna.

  • Welcome experience includes complimentary Gahwa & Karak.

  • Get a quick peek into the lives and style of local Qataris at the traditional Bedouin camp.

  • Up to 45 minutes adrenaline-packed dune bashing experience in 4X4 Land cruiser’s with trained drivers.

  • Stopover at the top of the singing dunes for a panoramic view of the desert. It’s also called Photography Dune.

  • Deck chairs and gazebo’s by the beach

  • A night’s stay at the royal 5 star camp in the middle of sand dunes

  • Get a quick peek of the unique Khor Al Adaid (Inland sea) and catch a gorgeous sunset.

  • Saudi Arabia & UAE Border on the opposite side

  • Layover at the camp

  • Bonfire and a 5-star buffet dinner as well as breakfast.

  • Private beach with kid’s play area

 

Inclusions:

  • Pick & Drop off from Doha

  • Professional Driver

  • Tour guide available on request

  • Dune bashing up to 45 mins

  • Water/soft drinks

  • Insurance

  • Swimming

  • Overnight at the camp

  • Exclusive air-conditioned tents

  • 1 Double bed and 2 single bed per tent

  • 1 tent capacity up to 4 pax

  • Private toilets/showers

  • Dinner & Breakfast


 

Itinerary:

Meeting Point: Pick up from your location within Doha city in 4X4 Land Cruisers.

Duration: 20 hours

Start time: 2:00 PM

 

Travel time: 45 mins each way

  • Pass through fertilizer industries

  • Stop at the traditional Qatari tents - public restroom facility available

  • Ride the camel in the desert and click pictures with falcons, mules etc. (additional charges)

  • Deflate tires for thrilling dune bashing -/+45 mins

  • Stop at 360 view dune - panoramic view (photography dune)  -/+10 mins

  • Visit the Inland sea (Saudi border) - Sunset time -/+ 20 mins

  • Visit our only luxury camp in the Middle East - A blend of traditional design coupled with modern comfort

  • Succulent dinner served in the midst of the desert

  • Sleep in comfortable tents with private bathrooms

  • Continental breakfast in the early morning with Middle Eastern Sunrise

  • Enroute to Doha (your location) -/+ 60 mins



Bring on Board:

  • Bring along swimwear, sunscreen, sandals & sunglasses as you will be in the desert. Lay back and relax while our hospitality experts take care of all your needs.

  • Don't forget your camera to capture this memory for a lifetime.

description: Experience the fun of scuba diving without taking the full certification course! The PADI Discover Scuba Diving program gives you a safe and exciting introduction to the underwater world of scuba diving. There is no better way to explore the underwater world of marine animals, shipwrecks, limestone formations and schools of colorful fish than scuba diving. Whether you are a beginner or an expert with decades of experience, the amazing underwater world you can discover around the planet is absolutely mind-blowing. From colorful fish to artificial reef to new GMC reef; you can explore it all in Qatar.

name: FTA - Hot Air Balloon Experience
shortDescription: Whether it’s a Childhood dream, a Romantic experience or a Thrill of a lifetime, a Hot Air Balloon ride is a bucket list favorite which fulfills dreams, promises stunning views and memories to cherish for a lifetime.
description:
Whether it’s a Childhood dream, a Romantic experience or a Thrill of a lifetime, a Hot Air Balloon ride is a bucket list favorite which fulfills dreams, promises stunning views and memories to cherish for a lifetime. Please note that a hot air balloon ride is subject to weather conditions. Therefore, your ride may be rescheduled for another day (we will inform you about any changes in the schedule in advance)


Duration: 45 Minutes

    What To Expect

    Whether you’re looking to give someone an unforgettable gift, or you want to see the Qatar from a breathtaking new perspective, a hot air balloon flight is a bucket list dream. Take to the skies and enjoy picturesque views with a 360-degree panorama offering you the full flight experience. 


    Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Rides Instead of sleeping the morning away, why not watch the sunrise as you drift peacefully across the sky with one of our balloon rides? 


    Private Hot Air Balloon Rides Whether you're looking for an engagement, wedding or anniversary present for your favourite couple, our private hot air balloon flights are guaranteed to delight. Feel like a VIP as you take in some of the finest views Qatar has to offer – all within your very own private basket! An utterly sublime gift idea to mark any special occasion.


    Terms & Conditions

    1. Safety Requirements for Travel

    Hot Air ballooning is an outdoor adventure activity. Your clothes should be comfortable with sturdy enclosed footwear (sneakers, boots).


    Ballooning activities intrinsically involve the possibility of physical risks greater than those encountered in daily life even though they are conducted under the supervision of pilots who exercise all due precautions to ensure safety. By taking part in such ballooning activities, passengers are understood to be fully aware of these risks.


    We do not accept liability for any costs or expenses you incur if we have to postpone any flight, where the reason for the postponement is beyond our control. You are responsible for your travel arrangements to and from the meeting place and we do not accept liability for delays in your travel arrangements. We cannot supervise vehicles parked at the meeting place and vehicles and their contents are left at your own risk and no liability is accepted for any loss or damage to your vehicle or contents unless it is due to our negligence.


    We are not qualified to express an opinion confirming that you are fit to fly and you must ensure that you are fit to fly. You must not fly if you are suffering from any serious medical conditions, or have recently undergone surgery unless you have a certificate of your fitness to fly from your doctor. You must not fly if you are pregnant or under the influence of drugs.


    2. Minimum Age Requirement

    We will not fly children under the age of 8 years. A child under the age of 16 years will only be flown if accompanied by a responsible adult, and the child is over 4'6" tall.


    3. Changing dates

    7 days or less notice you can change your booking to any other date with ‘no extra fee’

    6 days or less we can not guarantee, please email us if applicable

    4. Weather Cancellation / Delays for Balloon flights

    If weather does not allow, flights may get delayed until the next the morning.

    If you are unable to reschedule, you will get full refund from us.

    5. Cancellation and Refund Policy:

    Cancellation or amendment for non-group bookings more than:



    A cancellation or amendment for Group bookings prior to tour departure (a group is more than 4 guests in a single booking). The person whose name is on the booking will be considered as the group's leader and therefore accepts these terms and conditions for and on behalf of all the persons named on, substituted, or added to the booking form.


    14 days – 7 days prior to tour departure : 50% cancellation fee

    7 days or less prior to tour departure : 100% cancellation fee


    6. Flight Times and Duration

    balloon flights early in the morning as close to sunrise as possible, but specifically does NOT guarantee passengers will be in the air at sunrise, be aware that weather conditions or cloud may-of course affect to what degree the sun or sunrise is seen. Balloons travel with the wind, which governs their speed and direction. Accordingly, the duration of the flight may vary slightly at the pilot’s discretion.

name: FTA - Quickie
shortDescription: Spend four hours exploring the desert and enjoying a memorable dune bashing experience with 365 Adventures.
description:
Experience the singing sands dunes of Qatar.

Memorable desert safari experience!


There is nothing quite as exhilarating as an adventure in the desert, so join 365 Adventures’ professional team of desert drivers for a relaxing tour of the singing sand dunes of Mesaieed. Then follow that up by a thrilling dune bashing experience to treasure forever. 


In addition to visiting the place where three countries — UAE, Saudi Arabia and Qatar — meet, this 4-hour getaway will afford you the chance to get a close look at Khor Al Adaid, Qatar’s breathtaking inland sea. 


Khor Al Adaid is one of the few places in the world where the sea encroaches deep into the desert and is a UNESCO recognized natural reserve with its own robust ecosystem.


DESTINATION: Qatar

DEPARTURE/PICKUP LOCATION: Doha City limits


DEPARTURE TIME: 3 AM / 9 AM / 2 PM

DURATION: 4 hours 

RETURN TIME: Departure Time + 4 hours


DRESS CODE:

  • Comfortable Clothes

  • Flip flops/Sneakers

  • Sunscreen

P.S: Do not forget to bring your camera


INCLUDED/INCLUSIONS:

  • Professional driver

  • Tour guide (available on request)

  • Dune bashing (45 mins)

  • Water/soft drinks

  • Insurance

  • Pick-up & Drop-off

  • Camel riding (20 QAR)

  • Toilet facilities at first stop (camel riding stop)


NOT INCLUDED/EXCLUSIONS:

  • Meals

  • Swimmingd


TOUR PLAN/ITINERARY

Meeting Point: Pick up from your location within Doha city in 4X4 Land Cruisers.

  • Pass through fertilizer industries

  • Stop at the traditional Qatari tents - public restroom facility available

  • Ride camels in the desert and click pictures with falcons, mules etc. (additional charges)

name: FTA - Zekreet Tour
shortDescription: Call us now to book this recreational safari to the dramatic heritage of Qatar. Go back in time while you explore the natural beauty as well as the contemporary art of the country.
description: We have put together the perfect 6-hour itinerary for all heritage enthusiasts. Join us now for a day exploring the various natural gifts of Qatar including the Ras Abrouq Rock Formations & the Zekreet Beach as well as man-made wonders like the Richard Serra.

name: Full Day Desert Safari with Al Dahna Camp
shortDescription: Immerse Yourself in the Tranquil Beauty of the Saudi Arabian Desert at Al Dahna Camp
description:
Experience a day filled with adventure, cultural immersion, and natural wonder in the heart of the Saudi Arabian desert at Al Dahna Camp. Surrounded by breathtaking sand dunes and offering captivating sunrise and sunset views, this full-day excursion promises an unforgettable journey through the wilderness.


Escape to Al Dahna Camp, 120 kilometers from Riyadh, for a day of desert immersion. Begin at 9:30 AM with traditional Arabic hospitality—savor tea, coffee, and dates while getting an overview of the day's activities. Experience a guided nature reserve tour at 10:30 AM, exploring the mesmerizing desert with expert insights. Enjoy a lavish 1:00 PM lunch amidst the scenic desert backdrop. Dive into a sand walking adventure in your vehicle and engage in archery at 5:00 PM. Later, relish a delightful 7:30 PM dinner featuring Arabian cuisine. Gather around a campfire at 8:00 PM for warmth and camaraderie, followed by stargazing at 8:30 PM to marvel at the night sky's celestial wonders.

name: Gaithan Hike – Soudah Ranges
shortDescription:
KSA Summer Secrets: Soudah Season Getaway  
A laid-back adventure hike through the cool Soudah peaks to uncover a unique culture
description:
Soudah is a mountainous area in Asir in southwestern Saudia. Join us here to escape the summer heat by hiding in the jungle of juniper trees.

Make the most of this hidden gem in Saudi Arabia that is blessed by moderate weather throughout the year with temperatures rarely exceeding 25 °C (77 °F) in the summer.

Explore a distinct culture in the Soudah highlands, where you’ll meet the most friendly people wearing colorful traditional clothes including headbands and flower head wreaths.

Breathe out and relax in the natural beauty of this place where numerous farms are found. Uncover fascinating snippets of local history along the way.

name: Gurun Historic Route – Mount Soudah’s oldest route hike
shortDescription:
Saudi History & Hike in Summer
A Retracing of a 100-year-old hiking route through beautiful pathways & stories
description:
Time travel with us to a space where bedouins once moved with their caravans through the mountains of Asir.

We’re excited to explore the trails of Gurun this summer. This is the oldest route in Soudah, a mountainous area in Southwestern Saudi Arabia. This hidden gem in Saudi Arabia is blessed by moderate weather throughout the year with temperatures rarely exceeding 25 °C (77 °F) in the summer.

We begin our journey at Mosque Gurun, remembering the ones who walked before us. Pay attention! You could hear the stories of the past as you cross an abandoned resting place before entering the forests.  Immerse into this distinct culture in the Soudah highlands, where you’ll meet the most friendly people wearing colourful traditional clothes including headbands and flower head wreaths. Breathe out and relax in the natural beauty of this unique summer destination in the Middle East.

Technicalities:

-          Start at 3000 m

-          Hike down to 2600 m elevation and then return!

 

Tour Plan / Itinerary

●        Meet at Mosque Gurun

●        Briefing session and start hiking down

●        Pass by the abandoned resting place

●        Hike through the forest

●        Ridge walks

●        Stop at stunning viewpoints

●        Reach the historic bridge connecting the mountains of Soudah and the foothills

●        Head back

 

Meeting Point: Mosque Gurun

Whether you’re a seasoned trekker or looking for a casual hike,  the trails of Thee Ain will refresh you. 

Thee Ain is named after the water that flows in the nearby mountains. The trail opens up into multiple old abandoned houses, mosque, terraces… it’s a time travel experience!

name: Hot Air Balloon Experience
shortDescription: Whether it’s a Childhood dream, a Romantic experience or a Thrill of a lifetime, a Hot Air Balloon ride is a bucket list favorite which fulfills dreams, promises stunning views and memories to cherish for a lifetime.
description:
Whether it’s a Childhood dream, a Romantic experience or a Thrill of a lifetime, a Hot Air Balloon ride is a bucket list favorite which fulfills dreams, promises stunning views and memories to cherish for a lifetime. Please note that a hot air balloon ride is subject to weather conditions. Therefore, your ride may be rescheduled for another day (we will inform you about any changes in the schedule in advance)


Duration: 45 Minutes

    What To Expect

    Whether you’re looking to give someone an unforgettable gift, or you want to see the Qatar from a breathtaking new perspective, a hot air balloon flight is a bucket list dream. Take to the skies and enjoy picturesque views with a 360-degree panorama offering you the full flight experience. 


    Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Rides Instead of sleeping the morning away, why not watch the sunrise as you drift peacefully across the sky with one of our balloon rides? 


    Private Hot Air Balloon Rides Whether you're looking for an engagement, wedding or anniversary present for your favourite couple, our private hot air balloon flights are guaranteed to delight. Feel like a VIP as you take in some of the finest views Qatar has to offer – all within your very own private basket! An utterly sublime gift idea to mark any special occasion.


    Terms & Conditions

    1. Safety Requirements for Travel

    Hot Air ballooning is an outdoor adventure activity. Your clothes should be comfortable with sturdy enclosed footwear (sneakers, boots).


    Ballooning activities intrinsically involve the possibility of physical risks greater than those encountered in daily life even though they are conducted under the supervision of pilots who exercise all due precautions to ensure safety. By taking part in such ballooning activities, passengers are understood to be fully aware of these risks.


    We do not accept liability for any costs or expenses you incur if we have to postpone any flight, where the reason for the postponement is beyond our control. You are responsible for your travel arrangements to and from the meeting place and we do not accept liability for delays in your travel arrangements. We cannot supervise vehicles parked at the meeting place and vehicles and their contents are left at your own risk and no liability is accepted for any loss or damage to your vehicle or contents unless it is due to our negligence.


    We are not qualified to express an opinion confirming that you are fit to fly and you must ensure that you are fit to fly. You must not fly if you are suffering from any serious medical conditions, or have recently undergone surgery unless you have a certificate of your fitness to fly from your doctor. You must not fly if you are pregnant or under the influence of drugs.


    2. Minimum Age Requirement

    We will not fly children under the age of 8 years. A child under the age of 16 years will only be flown if accompanied by a responsible adult, and the child is over 4'6" tall.


    3. Changing dates

    7 days or less notice you can change your booking to any other date with ‘no extra fee’

    6 days or less we can not guarantee, please email us if applicable

    4. Weather Cancellation / Delays for Balloon flights

    If weather does not allow, flights may get delayed until the next the morning.

    If you are unable to reschedule, you will get full refund from us.

    5. Cancellation and Refund Policy:

    Cancellation or amendment for non-group bookings more than:



    A cancellation or amendment for Group bookings prior to tour departure (a group is more than 4 guests in a single booking). The person whose name is on the booking will be considered as the group's leader and therefore accepts these terms and conditions for and on behalf of all the persons named on, substituted, or added to the booking form.


    14 days – 7 days prior to tour departure : 50% cancellation fee

    7 days or less prior to tour departure : 100% cancellation fee


    6. Flight Times and Duration

    balloon flights early in the morning as close to sunrise as possible, but specifically does NOT guarantee passengers will be in the air at sunrise, be aware that weather conditions or cloud may-of course affect to what degree the sun or sunrise is seen. Balloons travel with the wind, which governs their speed and direction. Accordingly, the duration of the flight may vary slightly at the pilot’s discretion.

Celebrate a special day, cozy home party or a weekend getaway and make new treasurable memories.

As the name Houseboat suggests, this is a boat in the shape of a modern picturesque house and is also called Floating Home. description:
Cover your eyes, and count to three, Ready or not:

Let’s go find Ain Jamal Waterfall! 

This breathtaking oasis of natural beauty surrounded by majestic cliffs and greenery, is undiscovered by most travelers (and most locals living there!). The trail is a silent pathway with forests, numerous farms, and crystal-clear waters.  

Let lively bird calls guide your journey as you jump across rocky crevices and rest on pause to listen to the water flowing. Dip your face in the crystal clear waters to shake up your senses with Saudi’s natural beauty.

name: Kite Surfing
shortDescription:
1. - shared 2 hours 
600/person (if we find them the pair)

description:
Kite-Boarding Packages and other information.


Classes can be provided in 3 different languages: Arabic | English | French


4 Package Session's in total is ideal as explained below:

1. Ridin' Solo - For 1 person doing the 2 Hours Trial Session

2. Buddy Pack - For 2 persons doing the 2 Hours Trial Session

3. A Day To Wing It - Private session for 1 Pax - 5 Hours in 1 Day

4. Captain Of The Kites - 10 Hours Session for 1 Pax


All session are max 2 people. 


Equipment:

We provide all equipment for kitesurfing. 


What to Bring:

1. Sunglasses with strap(preferably cheap ones because they could get lost)

2. Sun screen (highly recommended)

3. Towel

4. Bathing suits

5. Food

6. Drinks

7. Camelback in hot weather 

8. Rash guard for hot weather or wetsuit in cold winter weather 

9. Water boots shoes 

10. You can find those things in some local fishing stores e.g Decathlon/Go sport/Speed marine


Location:

Courses are either held in Zekreet or Fuwairat based on the weather (wind/tide) conditions. 

Both locations are accessible by a regular sedan vehicle.


Rental equipment:

Rental equipment are available also for riders level 1 (if you can comfortable ride left and right side) and above.

A full set of gear for 2 hours costs 300 QAR. If there is any damage on the gear, a fee will be charged to the renter.

  • Full payment is required to confirm the booking
  • Tickets are non-refundable
  • Timing is tentative and subject to change last minute due to weather and the water tides

name: Marsa - Luxury Houseboat Experience
shortDescription: Luxury Marsa Houseboat - Capacity Up to 50 pax
description:
Experience the comfort & luxury of home on a houseboat 

Pamper yourself on one of the best luxury houseboats, bask in the warm sun during the day or enjoy the moon & stars at night from the middle of the pristine waters of the sea, outlining the heart of Doha city. Celebrate a special day, cozy home party or a weekend getaway and make new treasurable memories.

As the name Houseboat suggests, this is a boat in the shape of a modern picturesque house and is also called Floating Home. The Houseboats offer you ultimate comfort, luxury and the privacy of your own home while you are sailing on a boat. This concept is quite popular in some other countries and has been added to Qatar as well now.

Tour Plan / Itinerary

Meeting Point – The Pearl

Enjoy the views of

  • National Museum
  • 974 Stadium
  • MIA
  • Grand Cruise Terminal
  • MINA district
  • Westbay Skyline etc

Included / Inclusions

Sail in the serenity of water while enjoying fully equipped home modern amenities on the boat. The facilities on-board include:

  • Air-conditioning
  • Living room
  • Kitchenette
  • Ensuite bath
  • Smart TV and music system
  • Front balcony
  • Open air deck and relaxing chairs

Choose to stay overnight on the Floating Home, and create your own exclusive, personal travel experience. You may reserve the entire houseboat on a private basis for solo, couple, family or small group.

DRESS CODE:

  • Comfortable Clothes

  • Flip flops/Sneakers

  • Sunscreen

P.S: Do not forget to bring your camera

Embark on a thrilling ride at the RIG 1938, the world’s tallest tower and one of the most exciting attractions in Meryal. When ready for a chance of pace, head off to the beachfront. Our sandy shores provide an excellent unrivalled opportunity to relax and enjoy the sea breeze or get your energy back with one of our inviting food outlets.
